sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { chefOfTheWeek } from '../../../interfaces/Chef' import { AllRestaurantsContainerMobile, RestaurantStatus, StatusSelector, TitleR } from '../PopularRestaurants/StylePopularRests'; import { ChefDescription, ChefName, DesktopChefDetails, DesktopPicNameDiv, PicName, RestaurantDiv, RestaurantImg, RestaurantName, RestsDiv, TitleDesktop, TitlePP } from './StyleChefDetails' export default function DesktopChefOfTheWeek() { return (
RESTAURANTS {filterRests("All"); MakeAllActive() }}*/> All {filterRests("New"); MakeNewActive()}}*/> New {filterRests("Most Popular"); MakePopularActive()}}*/> Most Popular {filterRests("Open now"); MakeOpenActive()}}*/> Open Now CHEF OF THE WEEK : {chefOfTheWeek.name}

{chefOfTheWeek.Description} Yossi's Restaurants {chefOfTheWeek.restaurants.slice(0,3).map((restaurant,index)=>( {restaurant.name} ))}
); }
